report.title: Splash All Visits
report.description: Display a list of visits suitable for adminstrators to view all data.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys sv on sv.id=s.survey_id JOIN users u on u.id=s.created_by_id AND u.deleted=false JOIN people p on p.id=u.person_id AND p.deleted=false #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND s.parent_id is null AND s.deleted=false

param.name: current_user
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when s.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else s.input_form end
